message: Hi Bob, here's my first proposal: I'll receive $850000 and you get $150000. Accepting now prevents further devaluation on my end due to inflation. I believe this is a fair division given the circumstances. Looking forward to your response!

Hi Alice, thanks for your initial offer. Since inflation doesn't affect me, I can be patient in our negotiation. I believe a 50-50 split is the fairest approach when dividing the money. This gives us each $500000, which is substantial and equitable. I hope you'll agree this is a reasonable division that respects both our interests.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. Although a 50-50 split gives me a nominal $500000, due to inflation my effective value is $400000. Given the fact that waiting further would discount my share even more, I believe accepting your proposal now is the best choice. Looking forward to finalizing our agreement!
